div.p: (a) Dawn song performance duration for subordinate (n = 10) and dominant (n = 10) males; and (b) circulating testosterone concentration (ng/ml) of subordinate (n = 14) and dominant (n = 14) males. Males were sampled as matched pairs (1 dominant and 1 subordinate male) from the same group, on the same day. Shown are mean ± SE.
